import _slicedToArray from"@babel/runtime/helpers/slicedToArray";import queryString from'query-string';export default function getPathFromState(state){var options=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:{};var path='/';var current=state;var _loop=function _loop(){var index=typeof current.index==='number'?current.index:0;var route=current.routes[index];var config=options[route.name]!==undefined?options[route.name].stringify:undefined;var params=route.params?Object.entries(route.params).reduce(function(acc,_ref){var _ref2=_slicedToArray(_ref,2),key=_ref2[0],value=_ref2[1];acc[key]=config&&config[key]?config[key](value):String(value);return acc;},{}):undefined;if(options[route.name]!==undefined){var pattern=typeof options[route.name]==='string'?options[route.name]:options[route.name].path;path+=pattern.split('/').map(function(p){var name=p.replace(/^:/,'');if(params&&name in params&&p.startsWith(':')){var _value=params[name];delete params[name];return encodeURIComponent(_value);}return encodeURIComponent(p);}).join('/');}else{path+=encodeURIComponent(route.name);}if(route.state){path+='/';}else if(params){path+="?"+queryString.stringify(params);}current=route.state;};while(current){_loop();}return path;}
